mapper.select: select ec.id,ec.title,ec.cover,ec.price,ec.lesson_num as lessonNum, et.name as teacherName, es1.title as subjectLevelOne,es2.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course ec inner join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id = et.id inner join edu_subject es1 on ec.subject_parent_id = es1.id inner join edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_id = es2.id where ec.id = #{id}

SELECT ec.id,ec.title,ec.price,ec.cover, ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum,ec.buy_count AS buyCount, ec.view_count AS viewCount,ecd.description, et.id AS teacherId,et.name AS teacherName,et.intro,et.avatar FROM edu_course ec INNER JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ec.id=ecd.id INNER JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id=et.id WHERE ec.status ='Normal' AND ec.id= #{id}
